ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 117
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry, you re right, I just allow the Druid into the category (however wrong that may be) as they are strong in spells and weak in combat just like all the
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry, you're right, I just allow the Druid into the category (however wrong
that may be) as they are strong in spells and weak in combat just like all
the pure spellcasters. They are like a new pure spellcaster just that they
couldn't find any spells of there own :) Oh yeah, I can't believe I forgot
to put necromancer in my last post on the subject...

-Qefnir, a slow moving Bard in Tarew Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 19, 1999 1:54 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 117


: From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
:
: actually, what i understood was the only pure spellcasters are Enchanter,
: Magician, Wizard, and Necromancer, with druids not included here. is this
: correct?
:
: Shada Silverleaf, Level 45 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
:
:
: > -----Original Message-----
: > From: Pol [mailto:pmccy@...]
: > Sent: Saturday, June 19, 1999 10:50 AM
: > To: eqbards@onelist.com
: > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 117
: >
: >
: > From: "Pol" <pmccy@...>
: >
: > :Bind Affinity is for pure spellcasters, not hybrids or
: > jack-of-all-trades.
: > :My Cleric has traveled much more than my Bard, and this was
: > before the
: > Cleric had Bind Affinity.
: >
: > Correct me if I'm wrong (not meant to be sarcastic), but Clerics are
: > actually not pure spellcasters. Wizards, Enchanters,
: > Magicians, and Druids
: > are the only pure spellcasters (Druids technically being a
: > hybrid, but only
: > of pure spellcasters, thus making them one). Clerics are a hybrid of
: > warrior and spellcaster (healing spells). This is proven by
: > the fact that
: > they can use heavy metal armor and strong blunt weapons, and
: > can usually
: > hold their own in battle, yet being a very effective magic
: > class at the same
: > time with healing spells. So, if they are a hybrid and get
: > Bind Affinity...
: >
: > -Qefnir, a slow moving Bard in Tarrew Marr
: >
: > ----- Original Message -----
: > From: Wayne Sheppard <mrwayne@...>
: > To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
: > Sent: Saturday, June 19, 1999 9:42 AM
: > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 117
: >
: >
: > : From: "Wayne Sheppard" <mrwayne@...>
: > :
: > : There are no plans to allow bards to bind themselves. Bind
: > Affinity is
: > for
: > : pure spellcasters, not hybrids or jack-of-all-trades.
: > While Bards can
: > : travel a lot, we are the class that least needs Bind
: > Affinity. With Selo,
: > : we can travel much faster than any other class (besides the
: > high level
: > gate
: > : spells). And I don't understand where you think we are
: > "supposed to be
: > the
: > : most traveling class in Norrath". My Cleric has traveled
: > much more than
: > my
: > : Bard, and this was before the Cleric had Bind Affinity.
: > :
: > : Selo's does disrupt SoW. This is most likely a bug. Selos
: > also disrupts
: > : Root. This is most likely the same bug. Fixing one bug
: > will fix the
: > other
: > : bug. I think most Bards would prefer to have this "bug" in
: > the game.
: > : Verant seems to be willing to leave it in for "gameplay".
: > :
: > :
: > :
: > : Wayne
: > :
: > :
: > :
: > : > Date: Fri, 18 Jun 1999 17:58:18 -0500
: > : > From: "Bard" <dabard@...>
: > : > Subject: (no subject)
: > : >
: > : > First off, yeah my character's name is Barrd (Supposed to
: > be "Bard", but
: > : > that damned name filter...), which is a character I've
: > RP'd since the
: > good
: > : > old days of NWN. So no need to "Hey, great name ;ppp"
: > me, I've already
: > : > heard it all =oP
: > : > Question, does anyone know if there is any plan in the
: > future for bards
: > to
: > : > be able to bind themselves? Just kinda seems silly that
: > we're supposed
: > to
: > : > be the most traveling class in Norrath, but can't bind.
: > =o/ Also, any
: > : word
: > : > on why Selo's disrupts other group member's SoW?
: > : >
: > : > -=B=-
: > : > NOR Bard, Esq.
: > : > Baron of The Nest
: > : > Proud Member of the New OutRiders
: > : > Layer of the Almighty Verbal Smackdown
: > : > And One Helluva Nice Guy :o)
: > :
: > :
: > :
: > :
